title: 4J Studios: Minecraft PS3版销量排名榜首
author: cyqsimon
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-3-12 00:40 编辑 

4J Studios: #MinecraftPS3 was number 1 on the Playstation Store PS3 charts for February in Europe & US !
http://blog.eu.playstation.com/2 ... txk-toukiden-debut/
http://blog.us.playstation.com/2 ... -store-top-sellers/
4J Studios: 在二月间，#MinecraftPS3版是Play Station游戏商店（欧美区）PS3游戏中销量第一（的游戏）！
http://blog.eu.playstation.com/2 ... txk-toukiden-debut/
http://blog.us.playstation.com/2 ... -store-top-sellers/


官方统计数据显示

Minecraft稳坐销量榜首，可喜可贺！

只不过国人好像没几个玩PS3的......真的有那么好玩么？

replies.author: k1565
replies.txt_content: 可喜可贺。。不过表示入正了还是PC版的好玩。。
